languages.text: "Простите за беспокойство, Лорд-капитан. Подумала, вам стоит знать. Леди-Навигатор успешно вывела корабль из объятий варпа и покинула Санктум Навис... Но направилась не в свои покои, как обычно бывает, а по направлению к вашим. Вероятно, стоит подготовиться к встрече".

"Apologies for disturbing you, Lord Captain. I just thought you should know — the Lady Navigator has successfully guided the ship out of the warp's hold and left the Sanctum Navis... but instead of going to her chambers as usual, she headed for yours. Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."
languages.original_text: "Простите за беспокойство, Лорд-капитан. Подумала, вам стоит знать. Леди-Навигатор успешно вывела корабль из объятий варпа и покинула Санктум Навис... Но направилась не в свои покои, как обычно бывает, а по направлению к вашим. Вероятно, стоит подготовиться к встрече".

Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

languages.text: “很抱歉打扰您，舰长大人。我想您也许需要了解这样的情况——导航者女士已经成功引导飞船脱离了亚空间束缚。她离开了导航者圣所，但并没有像往常一样回到自己的房间，而是去了您的房间。或许您希望对此有所准备。”
languages.original_text: "Apologies for disturbing you, Lord Captain. I just thought you should know — the Lady Navigator has successfully guided the ship out of the warp's hold and left the Sanctum Navis... but instead of going to her chambers as usual, she headed for yours. Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉打扰您，舰长大人。我想您也许需要了解这样的情况——导航者女士已经成功引导飞船脱离了亚空间束缚。她离开了导航者圣所，但并没有像往常一样回到自己的房间，而是去了您的房间。或许您希望对此有所准备。”

languages.text: "Verzeiht die Störung, Lord Captain. Ich wollte Euch nur wissen lassen, dass die Lady Navigator das Schiff erfolgreich aus den Klauen des Warp geführt und das Sanctum Navis verlassen hat ... Doch anstatt wie üblich in ihre Gemächer zu gehen, ist sie in die Euren gegangen. Vielleicht wollt Ihr Euch auf dieses Treffen vorbereiten."
languages.original_text: "Apologies for disturbing you, Lord Captain. I just thought you should know — the Lady Navigator has successfully guided the ship out of the warp's hold and left the Sanctum Navis... but instead of going to her chambers as usual, she headed for yours. Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht die Störung, Lord Captain. Ich wollte Euch nur wissen lassen, dass die Lady Navigator das Schiff erfolgreich aus den Klauen des Warp geführt und das Sanctum Navis verlassen hat ... Doch anstatt wie üblich in ihre Gemächer zu gehen, ist sie in die Euren gegangen. Vielleicht wollt Ihr Euch auf dieses Treffen vorbereiten."

languages.text: « Je m'excuse de vous déranger, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je me suis dit que vous voudriez savoir : la navigatrice a réussi à guider le vaisseau hors du Warp. Elle a maintenant quitté le sanctum navis, mais au lieu de rejoindre ses appartements, comme d'habitude, elle se dirige vers les vôtres. Vous devriez songer à vous préparer pour cette rencontre. »
languages.original_text: "Apologies for disturbing you, Lord Captain. I just thought you should know — the Lady Navigator has successfully guided the ship out of the warp's hold and left the Sanctum Navis... but instead of going to her chambers as usual, she headed for yours. Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'excuse de vous déranger, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je me suis dit que vous voudriez savoir : la navigatrice a réussi à guider le vaisseau hors du Warp. Elle a maintenant quitté le sanctum navis, mais au lieu de rejoindre ses appartements, comme d'habitude, elle se dirige vers les vôtres. Vous devriez songer à vous préparer pour cette rencontre. »

languages.text: «Siento molestarle, Lord Capitán, pero pensé que debería saber que la lady Navegante ha guiado con éxito la nave fuera de la bodega de la disformidad y ha abandonado el Sanctum Navis... pero en lugar de ir a sus aposentos, como de costumbre, se dirige a los suyos. Quizás quiera prepararse para este encuentro».
languages.original_text: "Apologies for disturbing you, Lord Captain. I just thought you should know — the Lady Navigator has successfully guided the ship out of the warp's hold and left the Sanctum Navis... but instead of going to her chambers as usual, she headed for yours. Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

traits.locale_text: «Siento molestarle, Lord Capitán, pero pensé que debería saber que la lady Navegante ha guiado con éxito la nave fuera de la bodega de la disformidad y ha abandonado el Sanctum Navis... pero en lugar de ir a sus aposentos, como de costumbre, se dirige a los suyos. Quizás quiera prepararse para este encuentro».

languages.text: 「お騒がせして申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。お知らせするべきだと思ったので…レディ・ナヴィゲイターは歪みの拠点から無事に船を脱出させ、サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスを離れました…ですが、いつものように彼女の部屋にではなく、ロード・キャプテンの部屋に向かわれたようでして。お会いする準備をしたほうがいいのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "Apologies for disturbing you, Lord Captain. I just thought you should know — the Lady Navigator has successfully guided the ship out of the warp's hold and left the Sanctum Navis... but instead of going to her chambers as usual, she headed for yours. Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."

traits.locale_text: 「お騒がせして申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。お知らせするべきだと思ったので…レディ・ナヴィゲイターは歪みの拠点から無事に船を脱出させ、サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスを離れました…ですが、いつものように彼女の部屋にではなく、ロード・キャプテンの部屋に向かわれたようでして。お会いする準備をしたほうがいいのではないでしょうか」

languages.text: "Affedersiniz, rahatsız ediyorum Lord Kaptan. Bilmek isteyeceğinizi düşündüm; Leydi Rotacı, gemiyi uçsuzdan kurtardı ve Navis Kutağı'ndan ayrılmayı başardı. Ancak her zamanki gibi odasına dönmektense sizin odanıza doğru gidiyor. Görüşme için hazırlık yapmanız icap edebilir."
languages.original_text: "Apologies for disturbing you, Lord Captain. I just thought you should know — the Lady Navigator has successfully guided the ship out of the warp's hold and left the Sanctum Navis... but instead of going to her chambers as usual, she headed for yours. Perhaps you will want to prepare for this meeting."
